divs: Sighting Detailswe just walked outside. i looked up to see what i thought were ducks. It wasflying over in formation, five or six triangles. They went in a straight lineand were going pretty fast. Absolutly no noise and no lights. We only saw themfor about 5 seconds. Lost sight of them when they went behind a tree.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Flint
There were no other sightings in Flint on or around April 28th 2001
